alert.note: Alert for Bolivar Peninsula; Coastal Galveston; Galveston Island (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 6:19PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT GALVESTON COUNTY THROUGH 700 PM CDT... At 618 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Port Bolivar, or 7 miles north of Galveston Pier 21, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Galveston Causeway, Galveston Island West End, Texas City, La Marque, Hitchcock, Galveston Pier 21, Bayou Vista, Tiki Island, Pelican Island, Crystal Beach, Schlitterbahn, Scholes Field, The Strand, Port Bolivar, Offatts Bayou, Galveston Pleasure Pier, Galveston Island East End, Moody Gardens, and Bolivar Peninsula. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bolivar Peninsula; Coastal Galveston; Galveston Island
